pages.title: Kindle Flames Ritual
pages.text: To perform the Kindle Flames Ritual, you must channel intense heat and energy to smelt various materials.$(br)This ritual can smelt up to 16 items at once, processing multiple different items simultaneously.

pages.title: Ritual Ingredients
pages.text: Required Items:$(br)- 1 Hex Focus$(br)- 1 Campfire$(br)- 1 Water Bucket$(br)- 1 Cauldron$(br)- 1 Fire Node$(br)- 1 to 16 Ritual Braziers$(br)- 1 to 16 Salt.

Fill the Cauldron with water and place the Campfire beneath it. Throw the Fire Node into the Cauldron. Ensure all 16 Braziers are correctly arranged around the central Cauldron, with each Brazier salted. Place smeltable items onto the Braziers. Right-click with the Hex Focus on the Cauldron to ignite the flames.

pages.title: The Ritual
pages.text: Only items that can be smelted in a Furnace can also be processed.

pages.title: Result
pages.text: Upon successful completion of the Kindle Flames Ritual, the processed items will be smelted into their respective output.
